title: (eBook--English) Glavasic--Keepers of the Flame
description:
INFO 




KEYWORDS: short stories, fiction, philosophy, art, metaphysics, epistemology, ontology, ethics, literature, great philosophers, electronic books... 



LANGUAGE: English 
TITLE: Keepers of the Flame 
AUTHOR: Dragan Glavasic 
FILE TYPE: pdf 
FORMAT: eBook 
NUMBER OF STORIES: 35 
SIZE: 2.7 MB 
PAGES: 219 
YEAR: 2006 

DESCRIPTION: Electronic book, a compilation of 35 short stories. Some stories are mustery, science-fiction, comedy, historical naratives, mythology and most of them also deal with various subjects in philosophy, such as: life and death, imortality, existence and non-existence, metaphysics, epistemology, morality, ontology, free will versus determinism, etc. 

COMMENT: One of the best books I have ever read. It is well worthed to keep it in any collection! Best of all it is free. 

NOTE: This file contains three items: 
- Electronic book in PDF format 
- Cover of the book in JPG format 
- Info text in txt format 




www.glavasic.net 
www.stvarnost.com 



Please SEED, it is worthed! 



17 February 2008
